text: hrux phu dı lea ca rireim nı kar srang læw thrng hı man keid khun ma xik khrang hnung læa phu dı thrng prathan paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea cak fak fa læa phændin ca mi phracea xun khukheiyng kab xallxhˌ xik hrux cng klaw theid (muhammad) cng na hlakthan khxng phwk than ma hak phwk than pen phu saty cring
